description.value:
This robe is adorned with eyelike patterns. While you wear the robe, you gain the following benefits: • The robe gives you Advantage|XPHB on Wisdom (Perception|XPHB) checks that rely on sight. • You have Darkvision|XPHB and Truesight|XPHB, both with a range of 120 feet. A Light|XPHB spell cast on the robe or a Daylight|XPHB spell cast within 5 feet of the robe gives you the Blinded|XPHB condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of your turns, you make a Constitution saving throw (DC 11 for Light or DC 15 for Daylight), ending the condition on yourself on a success.

Attunement: true
